div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 484 Gaber, near Sofia, Bulgaria, 1960 Burial: c. 150-125 B.C. (T) Contents: AR Macedonia, 1st Region: tetradr. (3 well- preserved specimens with AP) Disposition: dispersed Gerasimov, BIAB 26 (1963), p. 257 A large hd. which may have contained other coinages
